state.userPrompt: Build a workflow that monitors changes in a Google Sheets document, validates the data using custom logic, transforms it into different formats (JSON, XML), and simultaneously pushes updates to 3 different APIs (CRM, inventory system, and email marketing platform) with proper error handling for each endpoint.

discovered.purpose: Examples of modern error handling using onError property
Resilient API call with automatic retry on failure
Transform data structure using JavaScript
Convert data to XML format for transformation requirements
Monitor changes in Google Sheets document to start the workflow
Enable parallel execution by splitting data for simultaneous API calls
Combine results from multiple parallel API calls back together

workflow.name: Google Sheets Multi-API Sync with Data Validation

parameters.jsCode: // Transform and validate Google Sheets data for multi-API distribution

buildPhases.description: Monitors Google Sheets document for any changes to trigger the workflow. Acts as the entry point that detects data modifications and initiates the synchronization process.
Validates incoming Google Sheets data using custom logic and transforms it into multiple formats. Converts data to both JSON and XML formats to ensure compatibility with different API endpoints.
Splits the transformed data into separate items to enable parallel processing. This allows simultaneous API calls to multiple endpoints for improved performance.
Simultaneously pushes validated and transformed data to three different external systems. Each API call includes robust error handling and retry logic to ensure reliable data synchronization.
Combines results from all parallel API calls into a single output. Provides consolidated feedback on the success or failure of each endpoint update for monitoring and logging purposes.

state.userPrompt: Build a workflow that monitors changes in a Google Sheets document, validates the data using custom logic, transforms it into different formats (JSON, XML), and simultaneously pushes updates to 3 different APIs (CRM, inventory system, and email marketing platform) with proper error handling for each endpoint.

discovered.purpose: Examples of modern error handling using onError property
Resilient API call with automatic retry on failure
Transform data structure using JavaScript
Convert data to XML format for transformation requirements
Monitor changes in Google Sheets document to start the workflow
Enable parallel execution by splitting data for simultaneous API calls
Combine results from multiple parallel API calls back together

workflow.name: Google Sheets Multi-API Sync with Data Validation

parameters.jsCode: // Transform and validate Google Sheets data for multi-API distribution

buildPhases.description: Monitors Google Sheets document for any changes to trigger the workflow. Acts as the entry point that detects data modifications and initiates the synchronization process.
Validates incoming Google Sheets data using custom logic and transforms it into multiple formats. Converts data to both JSON and XML formats to ensure compatibility with different API endpoints.
Splits the transformed data into separate items to enable parallel processing. This allows simultaneous API calls to multiple endpoints for improved performance.
Simultaneously pushes validated and transformed data to three different external systems. Each API call includes robust error handling and retry logic to ensure reliable data synchronization.
Combines results from all parallel API calls into a single output. Provides consolidated feedback on the success or failure of each endpoint update for monitoring and logging purposes.

node.purpose: Examples of modern error handling using onError property
Resilient API call with automatic retry on failure
Transform data structure using JavaScript
Convert data to XML format for transformation requirements
Monitor changes in Google Sheets document to start the workflow
Enable parallel execution by splitting data for simultaneous API calls
Combine results from multiple parallel API calls back together

workflow.name: Google Sheets Multi-API Sync with Data Validation

parameters.jsCode: // Transform and validate Google Sheets data for multi-API distribution

parameters.content:
##  Triggers
Monitors Google Sheets document for any changes to trigger the workflow. Acts as the entry point that detects data modifications and initiates the synchronization process.

##  Transform
Validates incoming Google Sheets data using custom logic and transforms it into multiple formats. Converts data to both JSON and XML formats to ensure compatibility with different API endpoints.

Splits the transformed data into separate items to enable parallel processing. This allows simultaneous API calls to multiple endpoints for improved performance.

##  Outputs
Simultaneously pushes validated and transformed data to three different external systems. Each API call includes robust error handling and retry logic to ensure reliable data synchronization.

##  Finalization
Post-output processing and aggregation

workflow.name: Google Sheets Multi-API Sync with Data Validation

parameters.jsCode: // Transform and validate Google Sheets data for multi-API distribution

phases.description: Monitors Google Sheets document for any changes to trigger the workflow. Acts as the entry point that detects data modifications and initiates the synchronization process.
Validates incoming Google Sheets data using custom logic and transforms it into multiple formats. Converts data to both JSON and XML formats to ensure compatibility with different API endpoints.
Splits the transformed data into separate items to enable parallel processing. This allows simultaneous API calls to multiple endpoints for improved performance.
Simultaneously pushes validated and transformed data to three different external systems. Each API call includes robust error handling and retry logic to ensure reliable data synchronization.
Combines results from all parallel API calls into a single output. Provides consolidated feedback on the success or failure of each endpoint update for monitoring and logging purposes.

workflow.name: Google Sheets Multi-API Sync with Data Validation

parameters.jsCode: // Transform and validate Google Sheets data for multi-API distribution

workflow.name: Google Sheets Multi-API Sync with Data Validation

parameters.jsCode: // Transform and validate Google Sheets data for multi-API distribution

parameters.content:
##  Triggers
Monitors Google Sheets document for any changes to trigger the workflow. Acts as the entry point that detects data modifications and initiates the synchronization process.

##  Transform
Validates incoming Google Sheets data using custom logic and transforms it into multiple formats. Converts data to both JSON and XML formats to ensure compatibility with different API endpoints.

Splits the transformed data into separate items to enable parallel processing. This allows simultaneous API calls to multiple endpoints for improved performance.

##  Outputs
Simultaneously pushes validated and transformed data to three different external systems. Each API call includes robust error handling and retry logic to ensure reliable data synchronization.

##  Finalization
Post-output processing and aggregation

errorPatterns.suggestedFix: Review node configuration requirements and ensure all required fields are set
